step.sql: INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_SAME_LINK (PID) (SELECT CN.GROUP_ID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK N, RD_SAMELINK_PART CN WHERE (N.PID = CN.LINK_PID AND CN.TABLE_NAME = 'RD_LINK'));
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_SAME_LINK (PID) (SELECT CN.GROUP_ID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RW_LINK N, RD_SAMELINK_PART CN WHERE (N.PID = CN.LINK_PID AND CN.TABLE_NAME = 'RW_LINK'));
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_SAME_LINK (PID) (SELECT CN.GROUP_ID FROM TEMP_AD_LINK N, RD_SAMELINK_PART CN WHERE (N.PID = CN.LINK_PID AND CN.TABLE_NAME = 'AD_LINK'));
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_SAME_LINK (PID) (SELECT CN.GROUP_ID FROM TEMP_ZONE_LINK N, RD_SAMELINK_PART CN WHERE (N.PID = CN.LINK_PID AND CN.TABLE_NAME = 'ZONE_LINK'));
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_SAME_LINK (PID) (SELECT CN.GROUP_ID FROM TEMP_LU_LINK N, RD_SAMELINK_PART CN WHERE (N.PID = CN.LINK_PID AND CN.TABLE_NAME = 'LU_LINK'));
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_SAME_NODE (PID) (SELECT CN.GROUP_ID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_NODE N, RD_SAMENODE_PART CN WHERE (N.PID = CN.NODE_PID AND CN.TABLE_NAME = 'RD_NODE'));
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_SAME_NODE (PID) (SELECT CN.GROUP_ID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RW_NODE N, RD_SAMENODE_PART CN WHERE (N.PID = CN.NODE_PID AND CN.TABLE_NAME = 'RW_NODE'));
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_SAME_NODE (PID) (SELECT CN.GROUP_ID FROM TEMP_AD_NODE N, RD_SAMENODE_PART CN WHERE (N.PID = CN.NODE_PID AND CN.TABLE_NAME = 'AD_NODE'));
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_SAME_NODE (PID) (SELECT CN.GROUP_ID FROM TEMP_ZONE_NODE N, RD_SAMENODE_PART CN WHERE (N.PID = CN.NODE_PID AND CN.TABLE_NAME = 'ZONE_NODE'));
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_SAME_NODE (PID) (SELECT CN.GROUP_ID FROM TEMP_LU_NODE N, RD_SAMENODE_PART CN WHERE (N.PID = CN.NODE_PID AND CN.TABLE_NAME = 'LU_NODE'));
SELECT P.* FROM RD_SAMELINK P,TEMP_SAME_LINK T WHERE P.GROUP_ID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_SAMELINK_PART P,TEMP_SAME_LINK T WHERE P.GROUP_ID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_SAMENODE P,TEMP_SAME_NODE T WHERE P.GROUP_ID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_SAMENODE_PART P,TEMP_SAME_NODE T WHERE P.GROUP_ID=T.PID;
DELETE FROM RD_SAMELINK P WHERE P.GROUP_ID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_SAME_LINK T );
DELETE FROM RD_SAMELINK_PART P WHERE P.GROUP_ID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_SAME_LINK T );
DELETE FROM RD_SAMENODE P WHERE P.GROUP_ID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_SAME_NODE T );
DELETE FROM RD_SAMENODE_PART P WHERE P.GROUP_ID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_SAME_NODE T );
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_SAME_LINK SELECT GROUP_ID FROM RD_SAMELINK A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM RD_SAMELINK B WHERE A.GROUP_ID = B.GROUP_ID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_SAME_NODE SELECT GROUP_ID FROM RD_SAMENODE A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM RD_SAMENODE B WHERE A.GROUP_ID = B.GROUP_ID);
